channel.title: Learnings on Colin Spear
channel.description: Recent content in Learnings on Colin Spear

item.title: Causal inference
item.description: Causal inference Causal Inference: The Mixtape Similar to Mostly Harmless Econometrics, perhaps a bit more accessible plus a chapter on DAGs The Effect I’m mostly interested in reading Part I on Research Design Cyrus Samii course Recommended by Sean Taylor via Twitter

item.title: Project ideas
item.description: Writing Persistence. How I’m bad at it and how important it seems to be. Persistence vs. novelty or curiosity. The way that doing small things over a long time accumulate Rationality and science vs. Narrative and feeling What is my comparative advantage? The insularity of the tech world (thinking of the brouhaha around Basecamp, a company of less than 60 people that was the only thing that people talked about in tech for a week) Vocation and the meaning of work Addiction On being a late bloomer How I’ve changed since becoming a parent Reading about fishing as a kid Other A podcast that interviews high performers on the sacrifices they’ve had to make.

item.title: Housing costs
item.description: Booming real estate prices Questions Why are prices going up all across the country / continent? How is Vancouver both typical and atypical in this dynamic? Links https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2021/05/deregulate-the-market-for-land.html https://www.policynote.ca/build-non-profit/#.YFDQV5fcRgI.twitter https://www.policyalternatives.ca/publications/reports/planning-build-out-affordable-rental-housing-metro-vancouver https://twitter.com/GRIDSVancouver/status/1399115931511529472?s=19 https://twitter.com/GRIDSVancouver/status/640544192045826049?s=19

item.title: Addiction
item.description: Questions What is addiction? Is it measures by our actions? Our desires How is it thought of differently in different cultures? What sorts of things are addictive? What are the consequences of addiction? Who gets addicted? Do we all have addictions to something? What do we do about addiction? How do we engage and interact with it both within ourselves and in our families, communities, countries and the world What is the purpose of addiction?
Resources Learn Python the right way
